scripts.check:types: npm run check:types:display && npm run check:types:renderer
scripts.check: npm run check:imports && npm run check:style && npm run check:types
scripts.image-display:poetry:update: cd RGBImageDisplay && poetry update && npm run image-display:poetry:export
scripts.image-display: cd RGBImageDisplay && export FLASK_ENV=development && poetry run python main.py
scripts.image-renderer:poetry:update: cd RGBImageRenderer && poetry update && npm run image-renderer:poetry:export
scripts.image-renderer: cd RGBImageRenderer && poetry run python main.py
scripts.tree:render: cd RGBImageRenderer && poetry run python main.py render ../tree/render_new.yaml ../tree/image_renders_new/
scripts.tree:serve: cd RGBImageDisplay && poetry run python main.py run 12 120 ../tree/image_renders_new/ --delay=0 --alpha=255 --rotate=90
